QuestData.Title: Freehold
QuestData.Description:
Well, there she is: Freehold.
You can get anything you want there, provided you can pay for it.
Whether you pay with gold or steel is up to you.
Take a look.
QuestData.CompletionText: Look, I'm worldly, but I don't have anything you can catch from my eyes.$B$BJust use the spyglass, would ya?
QuestData.RewardText: Ready to head face-first into a den of snakes?
